DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility clinical efficacy innovative care model combine Telemedicine consultation , educator therapeutic management diabetes education empower patient great control diabetes care improvement diabetes outcome .
DOC.brief_title: TREAT ( Telemedicine Reach , Education , Access , Treatment )
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess whether new care delivery model combine telemedicine videoconference diabetes consultation diabetes self-management teach efficacious reduce HbA1c patient type 2 diabetes rural area . The control group consist patient type 2 diabetes receive `` usual care '' , i.e. , receive referral endocrinologist telemedicine team . Secondary outcome include patient satisfaction , level understand self-management skill , hypoglycemia
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old type 2 diabetes Referral primary care provider . HbA1c equal great 7.0 % . Type 1 diabetes Gestational Diabetes
